# sshdgo
A ssh deamon on Go.

# Build
```
go build  -ldflags="-s -w" -trimpath
```

# Test cases

For safe, generate these files yourself via `ssh-keygen`.

file: `authorized_keys`
```
ssh-rsa  foobar@debian11
```

file: `ssh_host_rsa_key`

file: `ssh_host_rsa_key.pub`
```
ssh-rsa  foobar@debian11
```
